description: This file contains CMake functions and macros for header-only library installation and configuration, including generating config files and package configs for projects using CMake.

methods.name: HeaderOnlyInstallCMakeConfig
methods.description: Defines a function to generate and install CMake config files for header-only libraries, handling templates, dependencies, and target validation.

methods.name: HeaderOnlyInstallPackageConfig
methods.description: Defines a function to generate and install pkg-config files for header-only libraries, including options for compile flags, include dirs, and linking.
